Gennext IT Management & Consulting

Address: 33B, Pocket A Mayur Vihar Phase 2, Delhi 110091
Contact: +91-78400 79095 | +91-120-4994499
Email: info@gennextit.com
GST: 07AAGCG5856M1Z1

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

To,

{{ doc.intern_name }}


{{ doc.intern_address }}

Subject: Internship Offer - {{ doc.position_title }}

Dear {{ doc.intern_name }},

We are delighted to offer you an internship opportunity with Gennext IT Management and Consulting Pvt Ltd in the position of {{ doc.position_title }}.

Internship Terms and Conditions:

1. Internship Details

  • Position: {{ doc.position_title }}
  • Department: {{ doc.department }}
  • Supervisor: {% if doc.reporting_manager %}{{ frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.reporting_manager).employee_name }} ({{ frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.reporting_manager).designation }}){% endif %}
  • Duration: {{ doc.start_date }} to {{ doc.end_date }} ({{ doc.duration_months }} months)
  • Work Schedule: {{ doc.working_days }}, {{ doc.work_timings }}
  • Work Location: {{ doc.work_location }}{% if doc.office_address and doc.work_location != 'Remote' %} - {{ doc.office_address }}{% endif %}

2. Stipend and Benefits

    {% if doc.is_paid_internship and doc.stipend_amount %}
  • Monthly Stipend: {{ doc.stipend_currency }} {{ doc.stipend_amount }}
    • {% else %}
  • Monthly Stipend: Unpaid
    • {% endif %} {% if doc.certificate_provided %}
  • Certificate: Certificate of completion will be provided
    • {% endif %} {% if doc.letter_of_recommendation %}
  • Letter of Recommendation: Subject to satisfactory performance
    • {% endif %} {% if doc.other_benefits %}
  • Other Benefits: {{ doc.other_benefits }}
    • {% endif %}

3. Responsibilities and Learning Objectives

{{ doc.job_description }}
{% if doc.learning_objectives %}

Learning Objectives:

{{ doc.learning_objectives }}
{% endif %}

4. Compliance and Conduct

  • Adhere to company policies and code of conduct
  • Maintain confidentiality of proprietary information
  • Regular attendance and punctuality
  • Professional behavior and dress code compliance

5. Intellectual Property

Any work, ideas, or inventions created during the internship period shall be the property of Gennext IT Management and Consulting Pvt Ltd.

6. Termination

  • Either party may terminate this internship with 1 week written notice
  • Internship may be terminated for violation of company policies or unsatisfactory performance

7. No Employment Guarantee

This internship does not guarantee future employment with the company.

8. Legal Compliance

This internship complies with applicable labor laws and does not constitute an employer-employee relationship under the Industrial Disputes Act, 1947.

Please confirm your acceptance by signing and returning this letter by {{ doc.acceptance_deadline }}.

We look forward to having you as part of our team.

Yours sincerely,

Amit Gupta

CEO

Gennext IT Management & Consulting

Acceptance

I, {{ doc.intern_name }}, accept the above terms and conditions of internship.

Signature

Date

For any queries, please contact:

{{ frappe.get_doc("Employee", doc.contact_person).employee_name }}

{% endif %}

  1. Go to your ERPNext instance

  4. Select "Jinja" as the format type
  5. Paste this code into the HTML template area
  6. Save and set as default if needed
  7. Make sure to select "Gennext IT Letter Head" in the Letter Head field

{% endif %} {% if doc.custom_applicant_address %}{{ doc.custom_applicant_address }}

Subject: Offer of Employment

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

Further to your application and subsequent interview(s), we are pleased to offer you employment with {{ doc.company }} on the following terms and conditions:

1. POSITION AND DEPARTMENT

You will be designated as {{ doc.designation }} in the {{ doc.custom_department or '[Department Name]' }} department, reporting to {{ doc.custom_supervisor_name or '[Reporting Manager\'s Designation]' }}.

2. DATE OF JOINING

Your employment with the company will commence from {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.custom_joining_date or doc.offer_date, "dd/MM/yyyy") }}. You are requested to report at 9:00 AM at our office located at {{ doc.custom_work_location or '[Office Address]' }}.

3. PROBATION PERIOD

Your employment will be subject to a probationary period of {{ doc.custom_probation_period or '[3/6]' }} {% if doc.custom_probation_period|int == 1 %}month{% else %}months{% endif %} from the date of joining. During this period, your performance will be reviewed, and upon satisfactory completion, you will be confirmed as a permanent employee. Either party may terminate the employment during probation by giving [7/15] days written notice or salary in lieu thereof.

4. COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS

Your Cost to Company (CTC) will be ₹ {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_annual_ctc or 0) }} per annum, with the following break-up:

{% if doc.custom_professional_dev_allowance %} {% endif %}
Component Monthly (₹) Annual (₹)
Basic Salary {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_basic_salary or 0) }} {{ "{:,.2f}".format((doc.custom_basic_salary or 0) * 12) }}
House Rent Allowance (HRA) {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_hra or 0) }} {{ "{:,.2f}".format((doc.custom_hra or 0) * 12) }}
Special Allowance {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_special_allowance or 0) }} {{ "{:,.2f}".format((doc.custom_special_allowance or 0) * 12) }}
Professional Development Allowance {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_professional_dev_allowance) }} {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_professional_dev_allowance * 12) }}
Gross Salary {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.custom_monthly_gross_salary or 0) }} {{ "{:,.2f}".format((doc.custom_monthly_gross_salary or 0) * 12) }}

Salary Payment: Salary will be credited to your bank account on or before the last working day of each month.

5. WORKING HOURS AND LOCATION

  • Work Location: {{ doc.custom_work_location or '[Office Address]' }}
  • Working Days: {{ doc.custom_working_days or 'Monday to Saturday (6 days a week)' }}
  • Working Hours: {{ doc.custom_work_schedule or '[9:00 AM to 6:00 PM]' }} or as per project requirements
  • Lunch Break: {{ doc.custom_lunch_break or '[1 hour]' }}

6. LEAVE ENTITLEMENT

You will be entitled to the following leaves as per company policy:

  • Casual Leave: As per company policy
  • Sick Leave: As per company policy
  • Paid Leave: As per company policy
  • National/Public Holidays: As per company calendar

7. NOTICE PERIOD

After confirmation of employment, either party may terminate the employment by giving {{ doc.custom_notice_period or '[30/60/90]' }} {% if doc.custom_notice_period|int == 1 %}day{% else %}days{% endif %} written notice or salary in lieu thereof.

8. CONFIDENTIALITY AND NON-DISCLOSURE

You will be required to sign a Confidentiality and Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) to protect the company's proprietary information, trade secrets, client data, and intellectual property.

9. CODE OF CONDUCT

You are expected to:

  • Abide by all company policies, rules, and regulations
  • Maintain professional conduct and discipline
  • Not engage in any activity that conflicts with company interests
  • Protect company assets and resources
  • Comply with all applicable laws and regulations

10. BACKGROUND VERIFICATION

Your employment is subject to satisfactory verification of your credentials, background check, and reference checks. Any discrepancy found may lead to immediate termination of employment.

11. GENERAL TERMS

  • This offer is valid until {{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.custom_valid_upto, "dd/MM/yyyy") if doc.custom_valid_upto else '[Validity Date]' }}
  • The company reserves the right to modify your job responsibilities, location, or terms of employment based on business requirements
  • You will be governed by the company's HR policies as amended from time to time
  • This employment is subject to applicable labor laws of India

We are confident that you will make a valuable contribution to our organization. We look forward to a mutually rewarding association with you.

Please sign and return the duplicate copy of this letter as your acceptance of the above terms and conditions.

For {{ doc.company }}




_______________________
Authorized Signatory
{% if doc.custom_signatory_name %}{{ doc.custom_signatory_name }}
{% endif %} {% if doc.custom_signatory_designation %}{{ doc.custom_signatory_designation }}{% endif %}

ACCEPTANCE

I, {{ doc.applicant_name }}, hereby accept the above terms and conditions of employment with {{ doc.company }}.

Candidate Signature: ___________________

Date: ___________________
